home.title: FullStack Developer
home.description: I am a Full Stack Developer focused on cross-platform development, passionate about building innovative and efficient solutions.

about.info-description: Hi, I'm Diego Andrés Giraldo T. (DevAndresGT), a Full Stack Developer specializing in cross-platform development. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that efficiently integrate software and hardware. I invite you to explore my technical profile, the projects I've worked on, my approach to software development, and how I stay up-to-date on the latest technological trends in the cross-platform ecosystem.
about.card-tag: HTML · CSS · SASS · GO · Dart · JS · TS · JAVA · KOTLIN · SWIFT · NODE
